name: Booreal
description:
A spooky trouble maker game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1

Welcome, Boo!

The Johnsons family moved in their new house, but rumors say it's cursed and haunted. But the Johnsons don't care. "It's not real" they said. So you need to teach those sceptical hoomans a lesson and do whatever is necessary to make them belive

To have impact on real world items you have to bundle energy and speed up. Use the ghost-grappling to hook on light sources and gain speed. Find the weakes point of each family member.  Show them that you are real!

Free Assets only. 

Attributes:
Sounds from Zapsplat.com
Icons from smashicons.com 
Family models from cgtrader free sample pack and animations from https://www.mixamo.com/
